arts.ttl: Monza Secure Inter Defender Palacios on Loan
arts.sum: Monza have completed the loan signing of Tomas Palacios from Inter Milan, marking another strategic move in their quest to escape Serie A relegation. The 22-year-old Argentine defender will join the club on a six-month loan deal, with Monza set to cover his entire salary. The post Monza Secure Inter Defender Palacios on Loan appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Genoa Director Confirms Balotelli Will Leave the Club: “We Will Find a Place Where He Can Play”
arts.sum: The director of sports for Genoa, Marco Ottolini, spoke to Sky Sport just before the team's match against Monza. His comments primarily revolved around the club's transfer activities and the future of Mario Balotelli, who appears to be on his way out of the club. arts.sum: Genoa's injury woes are easing as they prepare to face Monza in Serie A on Monday evening. Portuguese forward Vitinha and captain Milan Badelj have resumed training and could make the matchday squad. Brooke Norton-Cuffy and Caleb Ekuban are also available for selection.
